mcq.statement: Social security law is an evolving law that tries as far as possible to reflect reality, to adjust to changes in and the needs of society.  12. Which of the following statements best summarizes the above?

options.b: Social security law gradually adapts itself to societal demands.
options.c: A good social security system ought to reflect every change in social values.
options.d: Changes in social conditions and needs imply the necessity for changes in social security legislation.
